_header: Alas whereto shall I now take
_description: The sinner forsaken by heaven and earth — three monorhyming lines

OxfBal149.Transcription:
Alas wharto shall y now takeTo qwham shall y my mone makeffor
                    heuene & erthe me hath forsake
OxfBal149.Editions:
Mynors,  Roger Aubrey Baskerville,
                        ed.  
             Catalogue of Manuscripts in Balliol College Library.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1962: 133.
